title: Mastery token level 6 in games you reach level 5

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: So i recently played a game on SR and achieved level 5 mastery that game with Leblanc. I was joyed to see I got an S- on that game but I was left wondering why you are not eligible to earn mastery level 6 tokens the same game. Technically at the completion of the game, I had mastery level 5 with her. Should I not be allotted the level 6 token?

replies.body: Hey, nope, not on the same game that you earned mastery 5.  Per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide), you need to already be Mastery level 5 before the game starts to be eligible for tokens.  It's not possible to level up AND get a token in the same game.  Sorry for the confusion, but grats!
